hero.title: Welcome to my sketchbook
hero.subtitle: A drawing each day. A story each week.

about.title: The Artist's Journey
about.p1: As an artist, I believe in the power of daily practice and continuous exploration. Each sketch in my collection represents a moment of discovery, a question asked through pencil and paper.
about.p2: My work blends traditional illustration techniques with modern AI-assisted tools, creating a unique dialogue between human creativity and technological possibility. Click on any artwork to explore the story behind it.
